text: Windsor, England ( CNN ) Britain's Prince Harry and American actress Meghan Markle sealed their wedding vows with a kiss on the steps outside St. George's Chapel in Windsor on Saturday, after a groundbreaking ceremony that didn't challenge royal norms so much as drive a gilded coach and horses through them. This 15th century royal peculiar - - a church under the direct jurisdiction of the monarch - - echoed to the sounds of a fiery Chicago preacher, a soulful gospel choir and the first black winner of a prestigious British music prize, as a constellation of A - list Americans rubbed shoulders with the bluest - blooded of British royalty.
